attributes.action: Help Turkey in need of fire planes & assistance.Fire raging across 60+ locations
attributes.additional_details: Turkey does not have enough fire fighting planes and cannot overcome the problem. It needs help from other countries as it’s spreading rapidly. We need the government/parliament to help and call other countries for help
attributes.background: We want the government to help and call for other countries to send help so that the fire that has already destroyed over 60 locations of forests, animals and settlements can be distinguished

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Help Turkey with the wildfires
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593834
